channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13753] Make metastore client thread safe in DbTxnManager
item.description:
The fact that multiple threads sharing the same metastore client which is used for RPC to Thrift is not thread safe.

Race condition can happen when one sees "out of sequence response" error message from Thrift server. That means the response from the Thrift server is for a different request (by a different thread).

Solution will be to synchronize methods from the client side.
item.summary: Make metastore client thread safe in DbTxnManager

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Upload patch 1. Eugene Koifman Can you review please?
Previous patch has wrong name. Corrected it.
Wei Zheng Is there a need to expose the underlying IMetaStoreClient object via SynchronizedMetaStoreClient?
Right, I should have removed that getter. Thanks for catching that.
+1 pending tests. I would probably make the IMetaStoreClient member within the SynchronizedMetaStoreClient a final too.
Makes sense. Patch 3 made that field client final. Thanks Vaibhav Gumashta for the review!

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12803771/HIVE-13753.3.patch
